value.stringValue: The Invoked_Closed_Lost-12 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Invoked_Closed_Lost-12, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Invoked_Closed_Lost-12 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Invoked_Closed_Lost-12, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.
ProcessLaunched: Update Contacts' Status to Active CS

rules.name: myRule_14
rules.label: All AMS and DUB Closed Lost

Flow.description: Sets close date to current date. Notify relevant teams and office. Create SFMC Connector Order if needed.

value.stringValue:
/* Termination order for SFMC Connector is needed when Renewal is lost and Account SFMC Commission is not blank or SFMC Connector is included in the OPP (the second condition is not necessarily needed (included in the first condition), however, added here just in case. */
AND( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), OR( TEXT([Opportunity].Account.SFMC_Commission__c) <> "", [Opportunity].of_SFMC_Connector__c <> 0 ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_10
formulas.expression:
/* Termination order for SFMC Connector is needed when Renewal is lost and Account SFMC Commission is not blank or SFMC Connector is included in the OPP (the second condition is not necessarily needed (included in the first condition), however, added here just in case. */
AND( ISPICKVAL({!SObject.Type}, "Existing Business-Renewal"), OR( TEXT({!SObject.Account.SFMC_Commission__c}) <> "", {!SObject.of_SFMC_Connector__c} <> 0 ) )

Flow.label: Invoked: Closed Lost
